kep.rows module¶

Read CSV file and represent it as a stream/list of Rows() instances.

class kep.rows.Row(row)[source]¶

Bases: object

CSV row representation.

class kep.rows.RowStack(rows)[source]¶

Bases: object

Holder for CSV rows. Allows extracting segments of CSV file and remaining part of CSV file, after all segments are extracted.

Operates on list of Row() instances.

pop(start, end)[source]¶

Pops elements of self.rows between [start, end). Recognises element occurrences by index i. Modifies self.rows.

remaining_rows()[source]¶
kep.rows.from_csv(path)[source]¶

Get iterable of rows from csv_path

kep.rows.get_year(string: str, rx=re.compile('(\\d{4}).*'))[source]¶

Extracts year from string string. Returns False if year is not valid or not in plausible range.

kep.rows.is_year(string: str) → bool[source]¶
kep.rows.read_csv(path)[source]¶

Yield non-empty dictionaries with ‘head’ and ‘data’ keys from path

kep.rows.to_csv(rows, path)[source]¶

Accept iterable of rows rows and write in to csv_path
